name: object-state-history
description: The ObjectStateHistory class is a JavaScript implementation that allows you to keep track of changes in an object over time, creating a history of the modifications.

scripts.push: npm run build && npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.push-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.push-major: npm run build && npm version major && git push --tags && npm publish
